idea-plugin.name: Tell Me
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful local AI assistant for IntelliJ IDEA. Analyze, explain, and refactor your code using local LLMs via Ollama. Features:
  • Local & Private: All processing is done on your machine.
  • Code Explanation: Get clear insights into complex code blocks.
  • Refactor Suggestions: Improve code quality with AI-driven suggestions.
  • Tabbed Interface: Manage multiple analysis sessions simultaneously.
  • Premium UI: Modern, dark-mode first design with glassmorphism touches.
